summary: The module showcases an early-binding approach using Cython's cpdef to accelerate area calculations for rectangular shapes. It defines a class that stores width and height and provides a method to compute the surface area, along with a lightweight helper routine for the same purpose.
business_intent: Demonstrate a performanceâ€‘oriented coding pattern that leverages static binding to reduce overhead in geometric computations, serving as a reference for developers seeking speed improvements in numerical or graphics applications.
